name: jstoxml
description: Converts JavaScript/JSON to XML (for RSS, Podcasts, AMP, etc.)
author: David Calhoun <david.b.calhoun@gmail.com>

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run npm-publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run npm-publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run npm-publish
scripts.npm-publish: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump: npm outdated & npm update && npm audit fix && npm test
